column4: ahh, crap.  did somebody direct a message to me?  i'm using irssi for the first time
how do i scroll up in irssi?
do you want me to paste my sources.list?
and, to whom it may concern, i think ndiswrapper-utils is busted on edgy
but anyhoo, one problem at a time.  apt first.
now i just need apt to work so i can install stuff.
you also know to run ndiswrapper-1.8 right instead of just ndiswrapper
yes, i know, i got that working.  now i have other crappy issues.
